amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the requirements of the legislation any rule that would reduce the cost of healthcare for people over the age of 65.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 232 (Roll no. 532).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 232 (Roll no. 532).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
